Package com.xceptance.xlt.common.util.action.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XPathGetable
    Well, true friends stab you in the front.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    URLActionDataExecutableResult
    Offers a gentle way and various methods to access data of a WebRespone.
    Access Headers : URLActionDataExecutableResult.getHeaderByName(String) URLActionDataExecutableResult.getHeaders() URLActionDataExecutableResult.getCookie(), URLActionDataExecutableResult.getCookieByName(String), URLActionDataExecutableResult.getHttpCookies() Access Body : URLActionDataExecutableResult.getByRegEx(String) URLActionDataExecutableResult.getByXPath(String) Get response code: URLActionDataExecutableResult.getHttpResponseCode()
    Get RAW response URLActionDataExecutableResult.getWebResponse()
    URLActionDataExecutableResultFactory
    Factory
    Creates URLActionDataExecutableResult depending on the type of response of the URLActionDataExecutionable.
    URLActionDataResponseHandler
    Handling the Response in form of a URLActionDataResult for a request described by a URLActionData.
    URLActionDataStoreResponseHandler
    Handles a URLActionDataStore item.
    URLActionDataValidationResponseHandler
    Handles a URLActionDataValidation item.
    XPathWithHtmlPage
    Implementation of XPathGetable.
    XPathWithLightWeightPage
    Implementation of XPathGetable.
    XPathWithNonParseableWebResponse
    Implementation of XPathGetable.
    XPathWithParseableWebResponse
    Implementation of XPathGetable.
